works.description:
these images were photographed and  
photoshopped by myself and coworkers.  We do have a copyright statement on
 
our site, perfectdetails.com.  Freeimagesonline.blogspot.com has taken  
these images without our permission and is allowing others to use them as 

well.  These images also appear in google search and they and others are  

getting credited for the images as well as traffic to their site instead
of  
us.  we own the images and inventory.
